title: 05 - Isolation vs. Connection
description:
Too many of us are living lonely. Let's talk about it. We are physically hardwired for connection and it is not optional! Let's make the choice to live radically connected, it could change everything.

(Don't miss season 1 that is all about how to make deep, connected, real relationships.)

GET OUT OF YOUR HEAD BOOK: http://bit.ly/GOOYH

DOWNLOAD THE FREE BOOK CLUB KIT: jennieallen.com

Stop your spiraling thoughts with Scripture using the Dwell App: https://dwellapp.io/jennie
